title: Language filter cannot be disabled
body: Under options in Chat and Friends, when I untick the option 'enable language filter' and click on done, it is still ticked even after I go reopen the options page. It also goes back to being ticked when I click on other sections in options and go back to Chat and Friends. This persists even after relogging the client.

replies.body: Yeah weird thing is I can see swearing in champ select but not in game and my mate can see it in game but not in champ select...
I thought there was an option in-game to disable it and spent 5 minutes trying to find it..
No, it was always in the client. Which it is there but it's not working correctly.
I've been having that setting reset every time I open the client. It stays unticked until I close it.
